pkgmetadata.longdescription: Immunoglobulin Clonal Lineage and Diversity Analysis // Provides immunoglobulin (Ig) sequence lineage reconstruction, diversity profiling, and amino acid property analysis. Citations: Gupta and Vander Heiden, et al (2017) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btv359, Stern, Yaari and Vander Heiden, et al (2014) doi:10.1126/scitranslmed.3008879.
